nodes.bodyText: Please, remove unnecessary space before closing tag RFC6266_
Consider adding a link for https://www.w3.org/TR/CSP3/#csp-header

While you are here, could you align javadoc for this header to follow a consistent format: {@code "forwarded"} is a header field that ... ... @see RFC7239, section 4 Please, also adjust X_FORWARDED_FOR, X_FORWARDED_HOST, and X_FORWARDED_PROTO constant. to use the same format.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -180,70 +233,104 @@
     public static final CharSequence FORWARDED = newAsciiString("forwarded");

nodes.bodyText: Please, remove unnecessary space before closing tag 5.5 _
Looks like a missed link to https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7235#section-4.1
